analyzeResult.content:
AT 625
Memorandum
See Below
From
B. A. Hammond
Group Sales Promotion Manager
RIVIERA Retail Conversion Program
Mr. R. J. Bunce
Mr. T. J. Riddell
Sales Director - Northern
Sales Director - Central
Mr. J. R. Nicomede
Mr. P. V. Sitler
Sales Director - Western
Sales Director . Southern
Mr. E. A. Pape
Sales Director - Eastern
We discussed the RIVIERA "Dare To Compare" Retail Conversion Program in St. Louis and this memo will serve to provide you with your allocation of packs to conduct the program in your Field area.
You have been allocated 50,000 free packs and 4,000 5 x 7 easel cards for use in this program that will be conducted August 24 - October 2, 1992.
The intent of this program is to establish RIVIERA distribution in high opportunity - non- display calls. The 5 x 7 easel card will communicate to the consumer that if they provide their retailer an empty pack of Kool, Newport or other competitive menthols such as Salem or Raleigh Extra Menthol, they will receive a free pack of RIVIERA.
To establish distribution for RIVIERA and to allow for the retailer to have product available for the program, one carton per style (4 styles minimum) must be Advance Ordered or sold in prior to the program beginning on August 24.
Your Sales Organization will reimburse the retailer in RIVIERA product, style for style (ie: RIVIERA Light King for Kool Light King, etc.). Careful monitoring of this program and retail outlet selection is essential to the success of the program.
Reporting of packs used will be handled as normal gratis on the gratis form and on the Expense Account under "Other" as "Riv. Ret. Com."
634301146
THE AMERICAN TOBACCO COMPANY
83€
I liza
July 22, 1992
-

paragraphs.content: We discussed the RIVIERA "Dare To Compare" Retail Conversion Program in St. Louis and this memo will serve to provide you with your allocation of packs to conduct the program in your Field area.
You have been allocated 50,000 free packs and 4,000 5 x 7 easel cards for use in this program that will be conducted August 24 - October 2, 1992.

The intent of this program is to establish RIVIERA distribution in high opportunity - non- display calls. The 5 x 7 easel card will communicate to the consumer that if they provide their retailer an empty pack of Kool, Newport or other competitive menthols such as Salem or Raleigh Extra Menthol, they will receive a free pack of RIVIERA.

To establish distribution for RIVIERA and to allow for the retailer to have product available for the program, one carton per style (4 styles minimum) must be Advance Ordered or sold in prior to the program beginning on August 24.

Your Sales Organization will reimburse the retailer in RIVIERA product, style for style (ie: RIVIERA Light King for Kool Light King, etc.). Careful monitoring of this program and retail outlet selection is essential to the success of the program.
Reporting of packs used will be handled as normal gratis on the gratis form and on the Expense Account under "Other" as "Riv. Ret. Com."
